about_the_game:
In this puzzle adventure, featuring 80s-styled graphics and modern physics, things are not always as straightforward as they seem. What starts as a simple journey to get to work turns into an adventure filled with obstacles, strange creatures, and inexplicable events.

This short demo features the first few levels of the game, hopefully giving you a good insight into what to expect from the full game.
detailed_description:
In this puzzle adventure, featuring 80s-styled graphics and modern physics, things are not always as straightforward as they seem. What starts as a simple journey to get to work turns into an adventure filled with obstacles, strange creatures, and inexplicable events.

This short demo features the first few levels of the game, hopefully giving you a good insight into what to expect from the full game.
name: A Ruthless World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, puzzle filled 80s-inspired world.
supported_languages:
English*, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
